&ltTBL>.HANDLE() Syntax Handle as N = &ltTBL>.HANDLE() Description The &ltTBL>.HANDLE() method returns the old style (Version 1) handle when using a new style (Version 3 and above) Xbasic object. This allows the Xbasic programmer to reuse Version 1 code on tables that they opened using the newer object methods. Example Newer style xbasic. dim tbl as P dim shared db_handle as N tbl = table.open("Invoice_header") ' Call a version one script that reads a shared db_handle db_handle = tbl.handle()
See Also Table Functions and Methods
